title: Mi Familia Perfecta
overview: The Guerreros are a dysfunctional but strongly united immigrant family. José María, El Patas, has to take care of his five siblings after their father passes away and their mother is deported to Mexico. Together, they overcome all obstacles to achieve the American dream. José María, Rosa, Marisol, Julián and Lili are living proof that it is possible to survive and improve in life, staying united and supportive of each other. This family shows affection through action.
